Entry.JapaneseText: この地上絵……本当に聖獣と 関係があるのかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: This geoglyph... Is it really connected to the Sacred Beasts?

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ……<Yellow>「陽炎の荒野」、「眠れる翼」<White>…… そして、ピピスタの<Cyan>聖壇<White>……
Entry.EnglishText: Hm... The<Yellow> wasteland's shimmering haze<White>... The <Yellow>Sleeping Wings<White>... And then the <Cyan>altar<White> in Pipista...

Entry.JapaneseText: 偶然では片付けられないものを感じるが…… とにかく確かめるしかあるまい。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't think you can discount it all as chance... But we'll just have to go see for ourselves.
